1.Name: Unfettered Fury
1.Description: Rusl & his son Colin are escorting one of their caravans back to Nal Ordona after making a trip north to Hyrule. Little do they know what awaits them.

2.Name: Fields of Resistance
2.Description: Curious as to what the Gerudo are doing this far across the mountains, Rusl & Colin continue their journey south.

3.Name: Unmasking the Threat
3.Description: Rusl, Ashei and Colin decide to head to the highlands and see what is happening on the border.

4.Name: A Common Enemy
4.Description: With the bandit fortress taken, peace should return to Ordona, or should it?
